runs.comm: full outside off and smashed straight away, runs down to third man and a tumbling Buttler fields and lets go of the ball before falling into the rope
off stump and blocked to cover point
length on middle and off, no room to swing that away, blocked back to the bowler
leg side and off the pad for four, very poor with this field
full and pushed into the covers
driven quite carefully just past mid off
length and chipped back to the bowler and taken! Hafeez falls first ball! Simply popping a straight ball back to Dernbach who took the catch easily at shoulder height to his left
middle and leg, defended into the leg side
driven from outside off, a sliding save at extra cover
off stump and dropped to point from the crease
driven to mid on who's deep enough to let them get a run
slower ball on leg stump, strikes the pad and runs behind square, they scramble a leg bye
picked up over extra cover for six. What a shot, perfectly timed, in complete control
length on the stump and dropped into the off side
full and turned out through square leg
slower, off the pad to short long leg
back of a length outside off, Shafiq goes to uppercut and misses
fuller and off the pad again to short long leg
dropped into the off side, fielder shies at the stumps, misses and it evades Patel backing up and into the deep for an overthrow
full and edged and a fine save from a diving Finn at short third man, excellent save
slower ball, guided down nicely behind square on the off side
slower ball and seen early, cracked over extra cover. Another excellent stroke, a proper stroke, and this innings is doing some early damage
quick now, back of a length and Zia is miles too late on the pull, gets hit on the handle
slower again on leg stump and dropped to square leg
middle and leg, dropped into the leg side in front of square
full, a genuine nick from a ball that nipped away, it evades the out stretched hand of Kieswetter and runs away for four, a real bonus for Pakistan
forward on middle and off, in comes the fielder...who can't hit and Zia's slide gets him home
excellent slower ball just outside off, gets under the attempted drive
down the leg side, tried to be swung away but missed
slower ball on a length outside off, cut into the off side
back of a length, angled down to third man, more good work in the field, this time Dernbach sliding to save four
length just outside off, flicked at and missed
length on middle and Zia late onto it, guided to third man
full on middle and leg, whipped away and a good save from short long leg coming up to save with one hand
driven to mid on
slower but width offered and slapped to point
back of a length outside off and dropped behind square on the off side
full on off stump, driven and Patel scrambles to his right to save
turn into the left-hander, gets an inside edge past the stumps as he tries to cut
tucked out through square on the off side
skip down the pitch and drive out to deep cover
length outside off and back cut to short third man
turn from a length again and blocked trying to cut
length and flicked out to deep backward square

length, played across the line, a huge cry for leg before and given out after an age. Deary me did the umpire take his time! But up goes the finger, replays suggest it pitched outside leg, even thought it spun sharply and probably hitting leg stump
pushed back to the bowler from a full length
turned through square on the leg side
full and Shafiq leans forward and goes to flick, inside edge into the pad
big spin past the inside edge, beating the forward press
full toss on off stump and cracked down to long off
middle stump and played across the line, worked to short long leg
down the pitch and pushed back to the bowler
leg stump and dropped to short long leg
dragged down but pulled out to deep square leg
dropped through the covers
goes to reverse sweep a ball outside off and misses
nudged into the off side from a length
smashed down the ground, not caught well enough but that saves the catch from the man coming in at long on, good work from Buttler diving forward to save the boundary
off the pad into the leg side playing forward
step back and cut out to the sweeper
step across the stumps and push to midwicket
length outside off, poked at and missed
a flash outside off and edged down to third man
full, a step down and lashed down the ground, no-one back and it runs for four
lucky now, an inside edge from one that nipped back and runs to the fine leg fence
angles in again and Shafiq forward and blocks into the leg side
full on leg stump and clipped out to deep square leg
full and sharp turn past the width of the stump down the leg side and a wide called! Ridiculous
pushed to midwicket from a full length
taken from outside off and dropped with the spin to square leg
full outside off and sweep down low out to deep square
full outside off and tucked down to long on
a touch short and heaved out to deep midwicket
worked off a full length out into the deep

worked into the leg side and they try to scramble a second but the dive is short. It was great work from Kieswetter who had to take the ball a long way away from the stumps but got the ball back with quick hands to run Shafiq out
outside off and driven hard to extra cover
down the wicket, fired in and Misbah adjusts and works through midwicket
full outside off and driven down the ground with decent timing
full on middle stump and blocked back to the bowler
off stump and flicked off the back foot down to long on
full and dug out down the ground
full on middle and flicked through midwicket
tossed up outside off and blocked coming forward
cut into the right-hander and cut behind square, only just, but it runs out through the off side for a couple
down the wicket and driven down to long on
outside off and punched down the ground
outside off and slapped behind square for four! Useful stroke
and now can just take singles, punching down to long off
middle stump, worked down the ground
length, steps back and chops into the covers
full on off stump and driven with a lean forward to extra cover
flicked from outside off wide of long on to allow them to come back for two
length outside off and Misbah pokes at outside off and misses
angled into Misbah who misses with a flick, gets hit and runs into the off side
full toss, dab and go into the covers
dropped behind the stumps, Akmal charges through for a bye, gets sent back, the throw back from Kieswetter is good but Broad can't find the stumps and Akmal gets back
worked from a full length through midwicket, wide of the deep fielder so they can get back for two
full and driven back to the bowler
full outside off, a massive massive heave swings Akmal off his feet
full outside off and driven through the covers, they can come back for a second
gets down to paddle sweep and a huge top edge goes to fine third man
flashed away off another top edge, this time to wide third man and Dernbach saves four
another massive heave, an inside edge to short long leg
outside off, an attempted back cut and missed
slower outside off and cut to extra cover
slower ball bouncer and called wide. It ballooned over the batsman's head
cut off the back foot out to deep cover
Akmal goes to paddle sweep and then adjusts to forward defend outside off and drop it into the off side
slower ball outside off, the Misbah heave into the leg side misses
pulled out down to deep backward square
full on the stumps and cut out to deep cover
outside off, a heave and miss and well saved from the keeper
slower ball outside off, flashed at again and missed
smashed straight up in the air and taken at long off. Another ball outside off, heave into the air and well taken by Swann out of the desert sky
pulled down to long on and a miss by Bairstow! It runs for four!! What a time for a misfield! Just what Pakistan wanted
heave outside off and missed this time
full and driven back to the bowler
full, slapped down the ground, a slide and save at long off

slapped down to long on, the through comes back to the keeper's end, gone!! Afridi is run out trying to come back for the second, a fantastic flat, quick return to Kieswetter who again did brilliantly get the ball back onto the stumps
flat, full, straight and dug out into the covers, great delivery
short and wide of the off stump, wide called!!
pulled out in the leg side but just a single as midwicket comes quickly off the fence
swung at, an edge to third man
bowled him!! A slower ball out of the back of the hand, Misbah swings and missed and loses his leg stump. England win by five runs, an absolute thriller of a game!
